controlling_fields.description: Primary conditional field that determines visibility of MSME-related fields
File upload field that triggers MSME certificate OCR validation and auto-populates derived fields

references.reference_context: Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory if duplicate vendor found based on Duplicate GST
Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory if duplicate vendor found based on PAN Card
Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory if duplicate vendor found based on Email Id
Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory if duplicate vendor found based on Mobile Number
Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory if duplicate vendor found based on Bank Account Number

intra_panel_references.original_logic: If duplicate vendor found based on 1. Duplicate GST 2. PAN Card 3. Email Id 4. Mobile Number 5. Bank Account Number then Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory 6. Business Registration Number (Applicable only for Import and International)

references.reference_context: Justification field is logically dependent on the exception checkbox being checked - would require justification when creating duplicate vendor
